title: Label
description: A label component that describes form input fields.

basicUsage.title: Basic Usage
basicUsage.description: Labels provide descriptions for form elements.

sizes.title: Sizes
sizes.description: Labels support three sizes: sm, md (default), and lg.

styles.title: Style Variants
styles.description: You can apply semibold and disabled styles.

required.title: Required Indicator
required.description: Use the required attribute to indicate a mandatory field.

withInput.title: With Input Field
withInput.description: Connect to an input field using htmlFor so clicking the label focuses the input.

scss.title: SCSS Styling
scss.description: You can apply label styles using podo-ui mixins.
